TITLE: World Cup 2022 - Qatar
RULES_TEXT_1: You get one point if you guessed the winner correctly.
RULES_TEXT_2: You get 1 point for the correct number of goals per team.
RULES_TEXT_3: In total you can get 3 points per match.
RULES_TEXT_5: The winner is determined at the end of the World Cup. The one with the most points wins.
RULES_TEXT_6: You can't make any more predictions when the match has started.
NAME: Name
